Description:
Key Responsibilities:Develop and execute social media strategies to align with our marketing objectives and brand identity.
Create engaging and compelling content for various social media platforms, including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, and others.
Schedule and publish social media posts, ensuring consistent and timely updates.
Monitor and respond to comments, messages, and interactions across social media channels to foster meaningful engagement with followers.
Analyze social media data and metrics to measure the performance of campaigns, track audience behavior, and identify areas for improvement.
Collaborate with the marketing team to integrate social media into broader marketing campaigns and initiatives.
Stay updated with industry trends and best practices in social media marketing and implement new strategies accordingly.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
Proven experience (typically 2+ years) as a Social Media Specialist or in a similar role.
Strong knowledge of social media platforms, best practices, and emerging trends.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills with a flair for creative content creation.
Proficiency in using social media management tools and analytics platforms.
Ability to analyze data and draw insights to improve social media performance.
Familiarity with social media advertising and experience in managing ad campaigns.
Understanding of SEO and its application in social media content.
Strong organizational skills and the ability to manage multiple social media accounts effectively.
Ability to work collaboratively in a team and meet tight deadlines.
